title: FTC Accuses Avast of Selling Customer Browsing Data to Advertisers
description:
European security vendor Avast is charged with harvesting consumer web browsing data through its browser extension and anti-virus software and “and sold it without adequate notice and without consumer consent.”

The post FTC Accuses Avast of Selling Customer Browsing Data to Advertisers appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Eye Care Services Firm Faces Lawsuit Over Data Breach Impacting 2.3 Million
description:
Eye care practice management firm American Vision Partners faces lawsuit over data breach impacting 2.3 million patients.

The post Eye Care Services Firm Faces Lawsuit Over Data Breach Impacting 2.3 Million appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Russian Turla Cyberspies Target Polish NGOs With New Backdoor
description:
Russian state-sponsored threat actor Turla has been using a new backdoor in recent attacks targeting Polish NGOs.

The post Russian Turla Cyberspies Target Polish NGOs With New Backdoor appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Threat Actors Quick to Abuse ‘SSH-Snake’ Worm-Like Tool
description:
Threat actors are actively deploying the recently released self-replicating and self-propagating SSH-Snake worm.

The post Threat Actors Quick to Abuse ‘SSH-Snake’ Worm-Like Tool appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: An Online Dump of Chinese Hacking Documents Offers a Rare Window Into Pervasive State Surveillance
description:
Leaked documents show how Chinese authorities surveil dissidents overseas, hack other nations and promote pro-Beijing narratives online.

The post An Online Dump of Chinese Hacking Documents Offers a Rare Window Into Pervasive State Surveillance appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: US Government Issues Guidance on Securing Water Systems
description:
CISA, FBI and EPA release guidance on how Water and Wastewater Systems Sector entities can secure their environments.

The post US Government Issues Guidance on Securing Water Systems appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Change Healthcare Cyberattack Causes Significant Disruption
description:
Change Healthcare is experiencing network disruptions after taking systems offline in response to a cyberattack.

The post Change Healthcare Cyberattack Causes Significant Disruption appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: US Offering $10M for LockBit Leaders as Law Enforcement Taunts Cybercriminals
description:
The US is offering big rewards for information on LockBit cybercriminals as law enforcement claims to have identified some individuals.

The post US Offering $10M for LockBit Leaders as Law Enforcement Taunts Cybercriminals appeared first on SecurityWeek.
